meanings.definition: One who examines or inspects closely.
meanings.sent1: The scrutineer carefully checked each document for errors.
meanings.sent2: The scrutineer at the airport security line inspected every bag thoroughly.
meanings.sent3: The scrutineer found a hidden message in the crossword puzzle.
meanings.sent4: She was a scrutineer of emotions, always able to see beyond the surface.
meanings.sent5: The scrutineer's keen eye caught the smallest details others missed.

meanings.sent1: I will scrutineer the contract before signing it.
meanings.sent2: The detective decided to scrutineer the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent3: He likes to scrutineer his food before taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: She would scrutineer the painting, searching for the artist's hidden signature.
meanings.sent5: The scientist would scrutineer the data to ensure accuracy in the results.
